conbody.p: As prescribed in 41.501(d)(6), insert a clause substantially the same as the following:

As provided herein, the Government will pay a nonrefundable, nonrecurring charge when the rules and regulations of a Contractor require that a customer pay (1)a charge for the initiation of service, (2)a contribution in aid of construction, or (3)a nonrefundable membership fee. This charge may be in addition to or in lieu of a connection charge.
